description.displayText: Rebecca nannied for our two children, 4 & 1, for the summer. She was wonderful. Punctual, reliable, and the children loved her. She was great about taking them out on adventures to the museum, park, swimming pool, etc. The kids were always happy to see her in the morning & sad to see her leave in the evening. We would absolutely hire her again.
description.originalText: Rebecca nannied for our two children, 4 & 1, for the summer. She was wonderful. Punctual, reliable, and the children loved her. She was great about taking them out on adventures to the museum, park, swimming pool, etc. The kids were always happy to see her in the morning & sad to see her leave in the evening. We would absolutely hire her again.

description.displayText: Rebecca babysat for us many times this past summer when she was home from school.  She is a very nice person who my children really liked.  She communicates well and responds quickly if you ask her if she is available.  She has a very positive, upbeat personality and is a natural caregiver.  We miss her and will definitely hire her again when she is home.  I can definitely trust her with my children and know that she will make great choices and keep them safe.
